sentences.en: ...a former Olympic champion.
sentences.cn: …一位前奥运冠军。

sentences.en: a champion of women’s rights
sentences.cn: 妇女权利捍卫者

sentences.en: A tumultuous welcome from a 2,000 strong crowd greeted the champion.
sentences.cn: 多达2,000名群众热烈欢迎冠军。

sentences.en: Comet also sired the champion foal out of Spinway Harvest.
sentences.cn: “彗星”还跟“斯平威·哈维斯特”生下了这匹出类拔萃的小马驹。

sentences.en: Gary Kasparov has retained his title as world chess champion.
sentences.cn: 加雷·卡斯帕罗夫卫冕了他国际象棋世界冠军的称号。

sentences.en: He is a quitter who is temperamentally unsuited to remaining a champion.
sentences.cn: 他是个遇难而退的人，照他的性格，不可能长期保住冠军的称号。

sentences.en: He passionately championed the poor.
sentences.cn: 他曾热情地捍卫穷人。

sentences.en: He received acclaim as a champion of the oppressed.
sentences.cn: 他作为被压迫者的捍卫者而受到了赞誉。

sentences.en: He was a champion for Latinos and blacks within the educational system.
sentences.cn: 他一直致力于在教育系统内为美籍拉美人和黑人争取权益。

sentences.en: He will be partnered by Ian Baker, the defending champion.
sentences.cn: 他将和卫冕冠军伊恩·贝克搭档。

sentences.en: His powerful serve was too much for the defending champion.
sentences.cn: 他的大力发球让卫冕冠军难以招架。

sentences.en: Historians built him up as the champion of parliament.
sentences.cn: 历史学家把他誉为议会的捍卫者。

sentences.en: Kasparov became world champion.
sentences.cn: 卡斯帕罗夫成了世界冠军。

sentences.en: Lewis is matched against the WBO's heavyweight champion, Tommy Morrison.
sentences.cn: 刘易斯对决世界拳击组织的重量级拳王汤米·莫里森。

sentences.en: Nelson Piquet, three times world champion, was grievously injured.
sentences.cn: 三度获得世界冠军的尼尔森·皮奎特受了重伤。

sentences.en: Seles won 10 tournaments, and was the undisputed world champion.
sentences.cn: 塞莱斯拿到了10个锦标赛冠军，是当之无愧的世界冠军。

sentences.en: She championed the cause of religious freedom.
sentences.cn: 她捍卫宗教自由事业。

sentences.en: She outpaced the former Olympic champion Evelyn Ashford.
sentences.cn: 她超过了前奥运冠军伊芙琳·阿什福德。

sentences.en: The champion, too, looked frayed at the edges.
sentences.cn: 冠军看上去也紧张、焦躁。

sentences.en: The heavyweight champion will be given a shot at Holyfield's world title.
sentences.cn: 这名重量级拳击冠军将尝试挑战霍利菲尔德的世界冠军头衔。

sentences.en: the Olympic champion
sentences.cn: 奥运会冠军

sentences.en: the world heavyweight boxing champion
sentences.cn: 世界重量级拳击冠军

sentences.en: Tim Powell is a former champion powerboat racer.
sentences.cn: 蒂姆·鲍威尔曾是汽艇比赛冠军。

words.tran_cn: 锦标赛；冠军称号；冠军的地位

phrases.tran_cn: 奥运冠军；奥林匹克冠军

trans.tran_cn: 冠军，优胜者，斗争者，支持者
trans.tran_en: someone or something that has won a competition, especially in sport
If you champion a person, a cause, or a principle, you support or defend them
